messages.message: Hi, my order was supposed to arrive yesterday but it still hasn't been delivered. Can you check what happened?
I'm sorry to hear that your order is delayed. Can you please share your order ID so that I can check the status?
Yes, the order ID is ORD123456.
Thank you. Let me check that for you.
I see that your order was delayed due to a logistics issue, but it has now been shipped and should reach you by tomorrow.
Okay, thank you for checking. I was worried it got lost.
No worries! I completely understand your concern. Rest assured, your package is on its way and youâ€™ll receive it tomorrow.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Your issue is now resolved.
